data.title: Nobel prize winner the discovery of method of interpersonal communication in honey bee is ......................Karl von FrischH.G. KhoranaHarveyDarwin
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:nobel prize winner for the discovery of methodofinterpersonal communication in honey bee is
data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

Karl von Frisch of Germany was awarded Nobel prize in 1973 for his discovery in the field of organisation and elicitation of individual and social behaviour pattern in bees. He showed that honey bees use a dance language to communicate food locations to other bees. He found two types of dance - round and waggle dance. Hence, option A is correct.
